article.headline: Morgan St. 76, Longwood 51
article.story: BALTIMORE (AP) -- Jamar Smith scored 21 points and Marquise Katley added 14 points and four assists as Morgan State defeated Longwood, 76-51, on Friday night. Boubacar Coly scored 10 points and had nine rebounds and Reggie Holmes scored eight points for Morgan (6-4), which avenged a 75-73 loss last season in Farmville, Va. Leading just 31-29 at intermission, Morgan opened the second half on a 6-0 run and never looked back. Forward Lamar Barrett scored Longwood?s first second-half points on a pair of free throws, which pulled the Lancers (3-11) within 37-31 with 16:13 remaining. Morgan then responded with a 13-0 run capped by a fast break layup by Smith, which extended the Bears' lead to 50-31 with about 12 minutes remaining. Longwood, in its first season as a Division I program, didn't score its first field goal until Barrett connected on a three-pointer with 11:50 remaining. Overall, Morgan outscored Longwood, 45-22, over the final 20 minutes of the game. Morgan appeared ready to run away with the game in the first half as the Bears led 24-14 with about 10 minutes remaining following a three-pointer by Smith. However, Longwood responded with a 13-3 run and tied the game at 27 with 2:22 left before intermission following a three-pointer guard Ryan Bogan. Bogan led the Lancers with 16 points and four rebounds. Kirk Wilson added 13 points, three rebounds and three assists for Longwood.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
